Title: Requires the DOT to determine which entrances to parkways in Westchester county are most frequently accessed by oversized commercial vehicles
Summary: Requires the DOT to determine which entrances to parkways in Westchester county are most frequently accessed by oversized commercial vehicles and to install certain barriers to prevent such vehicles from accessing such entrances.
ActClause: AN ACT to require the department of transportation to determine which entrances to parkways in the county of Westchester are most frequently accessed by oversized commercial vehicles and to install certain barriers to prevent such vehicles from accessing such entrances
